about_the_game:
If you don't want to wait until you've completed the game to browse the CG gallery in "Firefighter Connor"
or if you'd like to get your hands on higher-resolution images from the "Firefighter Connor" collection.
This DLC is perfect for you!

This DLC includes over 30 high-resolution CG images from "Firefighter Connor" all uncompressed and uncropped by the game engine, along with their variations.

After your purchase, Steam will automatically download the content. Once the download is complete, you can access the corresponding content in the local files of "Firefighter Connor".

content_descriptors.notes: Some content may not be suitable for all ages or for viewing at work, as there are a few scenes containing character nudity, war violence, or depictions of suicide.
